description:
The bitter winter cold has begun, and Keroro can`t stand it.  But he has to be able to go outside to buy Gundam models!  So he decides it`s time for the platoon to undergo special winter training.  Too bad Momoka has similar ideas about using the winter to bring Fuyuki and her closer together!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Shitou! Gunsou vs Fuyushougun de Arimasu / Fuyuki Sounandesu yo Nishizawa-san de Arimasu
Keroro contre le général Hiver / La station de ski privée des Bellair
ケロロ 死闘! 軍曹VS冬将軍 であります / 冬樹 そ~なんですよ西澤さん であります
